E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/9/1989
Subject: Progress of Rico Brogna
Dear Sir,
Rico Brogna has an AVG of .319 at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 8/8/1989
Subject: Erik Hanson healing process
Erik Hanson is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 8/14/1989
Subject: Progress of Domingo Jean
Dear Sir,
Domingo Jean is doing pretty good at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
He has an ERA of 3.87, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
